remarks: This is the usual definition of the Archimedean property for an ordered group.  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Jan-2018.)
statement:
isarchi3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
isarchi3.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` W ) $.
isarchi3.i $e |- .< = ( lt ` W ) $.
isarchi3.x $e |- .x. = ( .g ` W ) $.
isarchi3 $p |- ( W e. oGrp -> ( W e. Archi <-> A. x e. B A. y e. B ( .0. .< x -> E. n e. NN y .< ( n .x. x ) ) ) ) $.
$d .0. n $.
$d .< n $.
$d .x. n $.
$d B n x y $.
$d W n x y $.
$d n x y $.
